overview: Two drug kingpins rule the narcotics trade of a lucrative region of Mexico. But as their empires grow, it becomes clear that the market has room for only one top dog, and a deadly showdown between the two factions becomes increasingly inevitable. This Mexican thriller directed by Luis Estrada stars the prolific actor Eleazar Garcia Jr., along with Federico Villa, Ruben Gutierrez, Bernab√© Melendrez and Bulfrano Moreno.
title: La Hija de la Hiena
